text:
‘Antibody cocktail’ could cut risk of death from Covid by 70 per cent

MHRA is carrying out advanced tests of bamlanivimab and etesevimab after trials showed “very encouraging” results, writes @poppyeh https://t.co/VhUTpd6dwv
